self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes he will win by controlling Jerry's wrist and using his superior technique and power. He mentions that Jerry has only one technique and is not smart enough to adapt.

Jerry Cadorette.strength: Very strong, especially in shoulder pressure
Jerry Cadorette.previous_match_summary: Jerry wins in an 'ugly' way, creating bad memories for opponents.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks Dave Chaffee will come close to winning in the first or second round, but Devon will ultimately win by adapting his technique.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon's endurance is built for top rolling, not hooking.

Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Dave can win if he switches to shoulder pressure early.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes Morozov is in very good shape and will win, but warns not to underestimate Corey West's power.

Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Morozov has improved significantly over the past year.

Corey West.previous_match_summary: Corey can apply immense pressure if he gets into his preferred position.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin teases Ermes, saying Jerry will crush him and create new memories for Ermes. He jokes about Ermes being scared of Jerry.

Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes is confident but may underestimate Jerry's power.

Jerry Cadorette.previous_match_summary: Jerry wins in an 'ugly' way, frustrating opponents.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin thinks the match is very close, with both athletes knowing each other's techniques well.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon's endurance is built for top rolling.

Genadi Kvikvinia.previous_match_summary: Genadi never gives up, even when losing.
